author: dgeary
msg: The s:validatorScript tag (which must come after all s:commonsValidator tags) has a component sitting behind it that walks the component tree and generates JavaScript for all the validators in the tree. It discovers validators in a private findCommonsValidators method. I modified that method to look for required validators and set the associated component's required property to true.
